title: 5: S2E05 – "Morose Than Meets the Eye” – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales by authors Andrea Gullino, Adam Gray, James Colton, and Jonathan Reiman, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about undetectable demons, sinister swamps, towns out of time, and the death-scented depths of a lurid lake. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s2e05
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
